features: Elevated and opposing curves replicates effective massage therapy techniques
High and wide ridges stretch the muscles, high and narrow ridges squeeze muscles as you roll to increase circulation to hard-to-reach muscle tissue
Recommended for experienced foam rolling users
For best results, use the CHARGE Foam Roller™ immediately after physical activity
Measures 13 x 5.5 inches and weighs 2.2 pounds with a 500-pound weight limit
